entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
